item.title: My First Post
item.description: This is the first post on my blog, to see how Github static page hosting works! Let’s do some markdown: And a sub-title And a sub-sub title how far down do the titles go help I’m trapped in a title oh my god there’s no end this.is(code) this is longer code maybe it's some sort of shell script I don't know it isn't specified // This code is definitely javascript though // But which version?
